name: Dungeon Delver (itch) (Maygik)
description:
As a scout for the adventurer's guild, it is your job to appraise newly discovered dungeons in order to determine their difficulty ranking. Upon entering, a large thud sounds are you are trapped. Will you be able to escape the dungeon as you uncover the mystery of this ancient ruin?

Notice:
Baked lighting could not be implemented into the web version due to file size issues, if performance is low try using the executable version.
